subject: Re: Mysterious ghostly orbs perplex researchers
author: itcdeadpeople
full_text:
Hi Lyn.  I'm somewhat skeptical about orbs, though I have to admit I've seen some that are 
puzzling on some way, or really beautiful and vibrant, or just seem to be 'more than' dust. 

More recently my thought became this:  If those in spirit can manipulate the internal 
mechanisms of recorders, or sounds in the environment, in order to leave EVP, then why 
couldn't they also have the ability to manipulate dust, or other environmental factors, in 
order to show themselves?  For some reason, this just makes sense to me.  :-)

Margaret
